snippet: The states are seeking to block efforts by the Environmental Protection Agency to reduce carbon emissions from coal-powered plants.
abstract: Twelve states, led by West Virginia, file lawsuit against Obama administration in effort to block Environmental Protection Agency proposal to regulate coal-fired power plans as way to curb climate change; proposal is being attacked as 'war on coal,' that will lead to unnecessary shut down of plants and job losses.
lead_paragraph: The states are seeking to block efforts by the Environmental Protection Agency to reduce carbon emissions from coal-powered plants.

headline.main: A Dozen States File Suit Against New Coal Rules
headline.print_headline: A Dozen States File Suit Against New Coal Rules
